sentences.en: Airport pickup with homestay families or arrange taxi when students first arrive in Edmonton.
sentences.cn: 在学生首次到达埃德蒙顿时,安排寄宿家庭接机或出租车接送.

sentences.en: All international students live with homestay families.
sentences.cn: 所有国际学生都住在寄宿家庭。

sentences.en: Another growing trend is enrolling in a global education program that combines language study, homestay, cultural immersion, community service, and independent study.
sentences.cn: 此外，一项集合了语言学习、家庭寄宿、文化渗透、社区服务与独立学习的全球教育项目风正席卷全球。

sentences.en: Are you getting along well with your homestay family?
sentences.cn: 你和你的寄宿家庭相处的好吗？

sentences.en: Arrive in Melbourne . U pon arrival , airport pick - up and transfer to homestay family.
sentences.cn: 抵达墨尔本, 机场迎候,前往寄宿家庭或学生公寓.

sentences.en: Ask permission to bring your friends to your homestay.
sentences.cn: 请朋友来访需先征得住宿家庭的同意.

sentences.en: Homestay : You will be provided with your own room with a bed, dresser closet , and desk.
sentences.cn: 住家: 提供自己的房间配有床, 梳妆台.

sentences.en: M: I'm on a homestay program.
sentences.cn: 玛   丽：我参加一个接待家庭留学计画。

sentences.en: My homestay Amanda is preparing for the next holiday. She will take her daughters to dive.
sentences.cn: 全家一起享受灿烂阳光和新鲜空气,我的友好家庭女主人正在为接下来的假期做准备, 她要带孩子们去潜水.

sentences.en: Naxi and Ethnic Tourism: A Study of Homestay Tourism in Lijiang Old Town.
sentences.cn: 纳西人与民俗旅游: 丽江古城“住家游”研究.

sentences.en: Please give any pertinent information that would help us regarding your homestay placement.
sentences.cn: 请列出其他对安排你接待家庭有用的信息.

sentences.en: Remember, you have chosen homestay so that you could share in the Australian way of life.
sentences.cn: 要知道你之所以选择住宿家庭,是因为这样才能分享到澳大利亚的生活方式.

sentences.en: You could live in a homestay.
sentences.cn: 也可以住在当地人家中。
